Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone. I am experiencing a problem with KSP.

 

  • KSP version : 1.5.1 Steam, Windows 10 pro 64 bit
  • A detailed explanation: I had a problem with missing parts and this seems to be resolved with multiple reinstallation. Then the game was working normally, but now I have no contract on the mission control center. Sometimes, when I check the files system on Steam, some files are missing (44 precisely) and they are downloaded automatically. I tried to reinstall KSP multiple time, erase my saves, creating new save, check the files... But the problem is still here. I also discovered that I have a lot of local mission in the tracking station, but I have no mission available in the mission center.
  • A screenshot of your craft or any relevant screens : https://imgur.com/pOhRXXo https://imgur.com/rsenO95
  • A .craft file or save files 
  • The ouput_log.txt or player.log https://www.dropbox.com/s/q72rhrzcaj812zt/output_log.txt?dl=0
  • Are you running a clean installation, or have you updated and some of your persistence or craft files might be older versions, if so which version(s) : clean installation
  • system specifications :

      Time of this report: 12/9/2018, 22:27:40
             Machine name: DESKTOP-VC63NB0
               Machine Id: {28C9B13A-9F48-49B9-BC07-18114F72A2C4}
         Operating System: Windows 10 Professionnel 64-bit (10.0, Build 17134) (17134.rs4_release.180410-1804)
                 Language: French (Regional Setting: French)
      System Manufacturer: MSI
             System Model: MS-7A72
                     BIOS: BIOS Date: 07/11/17 10:08:40 Ver: V1.60 (type: BIOS)
                Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU @ 4.20GHz (8 CPUs), ~4.2GHz
                   Memory: 32768MB RAM
      Available OS Memory: 32728MB RAM
                Page File: 9405MB used, 28185MB available
              Windows Dir: C:\WINDOWS
          DirectX Version: DirectX 12
      DX Setup Parameters: Not found
         User DPI Setting: 96 DPI (100 percent)
       System DPI Setting: 96 DPI (100 percent)
          DWM DPI Scaling: Disabled
                 Miracast: Available, with HDCP
Microsoft Graphics Hybrid: Not Supported
           DxDiag Version: 10.00.17134.0001 64bit Unicode

I thank you for your responces

Welcome to the forum

That's a tricky issue...in the first moment, your log looks totally fine but after taking a closer look, I found something strange:

Hard to say what's actually the culprit of the issue but your game misses a bunch of files, for example: the 'Agencies' folder is missing and a few part configs as well (MK2 Cockpit, MK2 Dronecore and the LVN engine just to name a few but there way more). The missing Agencies is probably the reason for the missions not to be displayed properly.

My best guess would be a overzealous anti-vir scanner or any other tool running in the background, which messes up your files. Can also be some malware or something that seems to be unrelated (like the crappy twitch/curse launcher)..really hard to say

I disconnected my spyware/antivirus/malware => it didn't work

So I erase all windows et made a entire new installation with just KSP and the parts are still missing.

I don't know what to do to correct this problem.

Maybe if someone send me the "Parts" folder I will be able to correct the problem.
